alert.note: Alert for Mineral; Sanders (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:54PM MDT until August 29 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Mineral County in west central Montana... Central Sanders County in northwestern Montana... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 353 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of St. Regis, or 17 miles west of Superior, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Borgia and St. Regis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
